text: Sunbul (), alternatively spelled Asanbel, is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located north of the city of Aleppo and east of Mare', it administratively belongs to Nahiya Mare' in A'zaz District. Nearby localities include Arshaf to the southwest and Ghaytun to the east. In the 2004 census, Sunbul had a population of 1,003. ==References==
title: Sunbul
